name: MEC Bambini Pullover - Infants
description:
Soft and adorable, this hoodie is light enough to be worn as a base or mid-layer, and helps keep little ones warm. It has a snap opening for easy on and off, and the trim around the hood seals out drafts.Made of polyester microfleece that’s brushed on both sides.Raglan sleeves with flat-locked seams, for chafe-free mobility.Centre back length is 33cm (12m size)Machine wash cold separately. Do not use fabric softeners. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Do not iron. Do not dry clean.Coordinates with MEC Bambini Leggings, Onesie and Toque.

        Sustainability
